articles.author: Michael Toomey
articles.title: Robert Fico: why the attempted assassination of Slovakian prime minister could fuel the information war between Russia and Europe - The Conversation
articles.description: Russia is already capitalising on the situation, while government ministers are blaming the media for spreading ‘hate’.
articles.content: The assassination attempt on Slovakian prime minister Robert Fico on May 15 has sent a shockwave through Europe. Unfortunately political assassinations are not unheard of in this part of the world in… [+4621 chars]

articles.title: Spain claims its "biggest-ever seizure" of crystal meth, says Mexico's Sinaloa Cartel was trying to sell drugs in Europe - CBS News
articles.description: Spanish police said they dismantled a major methamphetamine distribution network of the Mexican Sinaloa cartel after seizing 1.8 tons of the drug.
articles.content:
Spanish police said Thursday they had seized 1.8 tons of crystal meth that Mexico's Sinaloa Cartel was trying to sell in Europe, the country's "biggest-ever seizure" of the narcotic.
Police arrested… [+2596 chars]

articles.title: Who is Juraj Cintula, poet and writer who opened fire on Slovak PM Robert Fico - The Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: Slovak PM Robert Fico was stable after an assassination attempt by poet Juraj Cintula. The motive is still unclear. Interior Ministry spokesman Neuman
